title: When do we receive our Provisional Degree Certificate?
content:
I'm a final year student at PES University and I've recently been accepted into a college abroad for my post graduate. The semester starts in the first week of September and the visa processing time is 13 weeks approx. I need to apply soon for the visa so that I can receive it before the commencement of classes.

I need my Provisional Degree Certificate in order to apply for the visa.  
After how many days from our last ESA do we receive our PDC? Also, is there a way we can get it faster by paying some amount? My last ESA is on 23rd May. I've contacted the university regarding this but they don't seem to respond.

comments.body: 3rd Jun the results will be announced, so around a week or two after that.
Just go speak with them directly
I’m in my final semester, we don’t have classes, and I am in another city rn
4th year ppl, when is ur official graduation and last day at PES?
Once the results are out, to annoy the CoE.
